participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and a bit introspective, Emily is navigating life changes after her recent breakup.
participant_1.background: i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and humorous, Michael enjoys spending time with his family and sharing laughs over horror movie plots.
participant_2.background: i'm a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. my father used to work for home depot. i have a son who is in junior high school.

content.text: what kind of movies do you like?
do you like to stay at home?
